Most founders and creatives struggle with a "Brand Gap": the distance between who they are and how they show up online. **The Identity Algorithm** is a high-performance workshop-lab designed to bridge that gap using the intersection of **Human Design, Archetypes, and AI.** This isn't a lecture on logos or fleeting trends. It‚Äôs a guided laboratory where we use Myhart.ai to translate your professional DNA into a coherent, visual, and strategic brand foundation that you can actually use. **The Lab Experience** We strip away the noise and focus on Radical Coherence. You‚Äôll explore your brand from a deeper, more strategic, and more intelligent place‚Äîcombining ancient symbolic frameworks with the cutting-edge power of AI. * **Human Intelligence:** Tap into your unique design and psychological archetypes. * **Artificial Intelligence:** Leverage [Myhart.ai](https://myhart.ai/) to process your essence into tangible assets. * **Tangible Execution:** Walk away with decisions made, not just notes taken. **The Architecture of the Workshop** ***1\. Decoding the Core \(Strategic Alignment\)*** We dive into the "source code" of your brand: * ***Core Values & Archetypes:*** Identifying the psychological pillars of your identity. * ***The Narrative Bridge:*** Aligning who you are, what you sell, and how you communicate. * ***Strategic Coherence:*** Ensuring your product and your story speak the same language. * **2\. System Activation \(Platform Onboarding\)** No "do it later" excuses. ***We‚Äôll guide you step-by-step to create*** your Myhart.ai account and activate your personal workspace. **3\. Live Brand Synthesis \(The Build\)** Work directly inside the platform to materialize your identity: * ***Visual DNA:*** Colors, Logo direction, and aesthetic pillars. * ***Strategic Messaging:*** Key brand pillars and your unique voice. * ***Execution:*** Walk away with a functional brand kit ready for the real world. **Who is this for?** The **Identity Algorithm** is for **Solopreneurs, Founders, and Creatives** who: * Value authenticity as their primary competitive advantage. * Want to integrate AI in a human, strategic, and aligned way. * Are ready to move from "brand theory" to brand clarity. **Stop guessing. Start decoding**. Build a brand that represents the human behind the screen. ***Important Note*** ***Bring a laptop! This is hands-on building, not just watching.*** **About your Facilitator - Emilia Ronchetti** With over a decade of experience as a UX Design Leader and Content Strategist, Emilia has led product and design teams across tech and AI-driven companies, specializing in turning complex systems into clear, human-centered experiences. Myhart.ai sits at the intersection of AI, design, and consciousness. The platform combines rigorous product thinking with spiritual and symbolic frameworks such as astrology, human design, and archetypes, helping founders create aligned brand identities without relying on traditional agencies. Alongside her work in AI, Emilia is a certified non-dual teacher and facilitator of energy-based practices, which deeply informs Myhart.ai‚Äôs philosophy. title: Lisbon Real Estate & Investment Talks
description: **Lisbon Real Estate & Investment Talks @ Le Consulat (Chiado)** Join us for an informal, international meetup about **buying, investing, and living in Portugal** ‚Äî with a strong focus on **Lisbon and its surrounding areas**. This is a friendly evening to learn, ask questions, and meet people who are navigating the market (or already investing) ‚Äî over drinks in the heart of Chiado. ### **What we‚Äôll cover** * **Portugal buying process**: the steps, common pitfalls, and timelines * **Market pulse**: what‚Äôs happening right now in Lisbon (prices, demand, typical strategies) * **Investor Q&A**: financing, rentals (long-term vs. short-term), yields, and due diligence * **Networking**: meet buyers, investors, and locals with real experience (bring your questions) ### **Who should come?** * If you‚Äôre planning to **buy** in Portugal * If you‚Äôre looking for an **investment** * If you want to understand the market and build a local network * If you're curious and want to share a good time **Language:** English (questions welcome in French / Portuguese too) **Format:** short talk + open Q&A + networking (casual, no pressure) I‚Äôll also introduce the professionals I work with regularly ‚Äî typically including a **real-estate lawyer**, **mortgage broker**, architect, civil engineer and other trusted partners (tax/accounting, renovation, property management/concierge), so you know who to call depending on your situation. A big thank you to **Tribe Social Club** for hosting us at this beautiful Chiado location overlooking Pra√ßa Lu√≠s de Cam√µes. *Disclaimer: this meetup is for education and networking ‚Äî not financial or legal advice.*

title: Storytelling Night‚Äî"LOVE"
description: Our theme for February is a tradition and one of our absolute favorites: **LOVE** ‚ù§Ô∏è **Give us the whole range:** your sappy, tumultuous, complex, sweet, funny, tragic, and magical love stories. Unrequited love. Soulmate love. Familial love. Eros. Agape. Philia. **As always, interpret the theme freely.** Maybe it is about that time your ex showed up when you really needed it and now you two are married. Or when you swiped right on Tinder and then fell in love at first sight‚Äîonly s/he, unfortunately, did not. Or about your pet parrot that you have raised since he was in the egg and whose love you have felt more than from any other being in your life. **Please come just to listen or get on stage,** be vulnerable, and share with us, a diverse group of welcoming and open people who are curious about each others' lives. Stories will last from 7 to 10 minutes. Expect ten stories plus an intermission. **We will hold our event at F√°brica Bra√ßo de Prata,** an enormous multi-roomed centro cultural in Marvila that hosts everything from salsa bands to intimate piano concerts to philosophical comedy. To accommodate everyone, we will be in the outdoor tent right inside the gate to F√°brica Bra√ßo de Prata. Love is a popular edition, arrive early to get good seats. **Storytelling Lisboa is a completely free event run by volunteers.** We welcome everyone to get on stage! Absolutely no experience is necessary. We only ask that stories be true and personal and that they are performed as opposed to read‚Äîand they should be stories instead of philosophical musings, motivational speeches, or stand-up routines. The content is completely at the discretion of the storyteller as long as it is related in the monthly theme and respectful to the diversity and experiences of all humans. **Interested in sharing a story?** We give spots on a first come, first serve basis. Please fill out our form here: [https://forms.gle/kkGhEM47BLF4WRkg9](https://forms.gle/kkGhEM47BLF4WRkg9) **We now have an email list** to subscribe to keep up with events. You can [subscribe with this link](http://eepurl.com/iXpMeI). We also have [a WhatsApp Group ](https://chat.whatsapp.com/BpN6iJGSp8fCnzKA0TSRra)if you prefer to get updates directly to your phone! For any questions or concerns, reach out to us by DM on our instagram [@storytellinglisboa](https://www.instagram.com/storytellinglisboa)! Or email storytellinglisboa at gmail dot com. **Bring some cash to throw into our donation jar!** We will always be free and want everyone to be able to attend, but your funds help sustain the increasing effort and volunteers needed to put on the event. We also have a podcast if you want to enjoy stories from home called **[What Lingers.](https://www.instagram.com/whatlingerspod)** You can find it on all podcast platforms! All links related to Storytelling Lisboa can additionally be found on our linktree: [https://linktr.ee/storytellinglisboa](https://linktr.ee/storytellinglisboa) Photo: [@lefeber_pics](https://www.instagram.com/lefeber_pics)

Ô∏è **[Click here to register for the event](https://luma.com/f2smu7zz)** Ô∏è ‚ú® **Speed Friending: Spring-Is-Coming Edition ‚Äì a one-night event designed to help you connect with people in Lisbon.** ‚ö° Winter is done playing games. Spring is coming. Longer days. Softer air. That ‚Äú*maybe I should go outside and meet people*‚Äù feeling. **This night is for that moment** ‚Äî when you‚Äôre ready to come back to life socially and wake up after long rainy days. *‚≠ê Short, intentional 1-on-1 conversations. A simple, comfortable way to meet new people. Just sit down. Talk. Connect. Like you mean it.* **Why you should come:** * Because you‚Äôre tired of shouting small talk across crowded bars; * Because WhatsApp groups don‚Äôt make real friends; * Because Lisbon deserves a better way to connect. \*\* So, how does it work?\*\* ‚Äì The space will be set up with small tables for two. ‚Äì You‚Äôll have a series of **1-on-1 conversations**, each lasting 10‚Äì15 minutes. ‚Äì You don‚Äôt have to approach anyone. You just sit down ‚Äî and talk. ‚Äì We guide the flow and tell you when to rotate. ‚úÖ This is a **guided**, one-on-one event. ‚úÖ Each table has **optional prompt cards** to help move past small talk. ‚úÖ No awkward moments when trying to start a conversation. At the end, you‚Äôll have time to reconnect with anyone you clicked, grab a drink, and hang out in a more open setting. ‚ú®Structured enough to make it easy. ‚ú®Relaxed enough to feel real. And because it‚Äôs **Saturday**, the night doesn‚Äôt have to end there ‚Äî people usually leave in small, newly-formed groups and keep the evening going ‚Äã **Who It‚Äôs For** * You live/work in Lisbon (or just landed) and want a real circle here. * You‚Äôre tired of surface-level conversations. * ‚ÄãYou‚Äôd rather connect one-on-one than shout over a crowd. * You‚Äôre curious, respectful, open-minded and looking for something real. \*\* The details\*\* Ô∏è **When:** Saturday, 7th of March at 16:00 **Where:** Lisbon (exact venue shared with confirmed guests ‚Äì to make it natural and avoid walk-ins) Ô∏è **Event fee:** ‚Ç¨7 (early-bird)/‚Ç¨10 (general admission)/‚Ç¨15 (late bird). The format actually helps ‚Äî you don‚Äôt need to approach anyone or come up with the perfect opener. **\- Is this like speed dating?** The format is similar (1-on-1 conversations that rotate), but there‚Äôs no romantic pressure.
